text: @SupraDarky What would you say was your favorite? Perhaps a top 5 listing, either in order or not. But you know, we fans really do like to know your opinion on video game music. It is, after all, the basic purpose for us coming back after almost 900 songs. Oh boy, that's coming up soon... umm so yeah, can haz a top 5 2009 OSTs? Or something. Even though it was 2 years ago, as I just realized. Sorry, I'm a little tired, but still genuinely interested :)
